Key Match Events: Mohamed Salah left the game with a hamstring injury in the first half.
Ghana scored the first goal through Mohammed Kudus.
Egypt equalized twice after going behind.
A disallowed goal for Egypt in the 51st minute.
Emilio Nsue scored a hat-trick for Equatorial Guinea against Guinea-Bissau.
Post-Match Reflections: Salah's injury led to Egypt's defensive struggles early on.
Egypt showed resilience after trailing twice.
Controversial decisions by the referee were noted.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nsue's hat-trick was the first since 2008 at Afcon.
Nigeria defeated Ivory Coast with a penalty from William Troost-Ekong.
